trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects to and from various other representations.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of the CultureInfoConverter class.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> using the specified context.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the specified value object to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
value specifies a culture that is not valid.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Converts the given value object to the specified destination type.
This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to which to convert.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value to.
An that represents the converted value.
destinationType is .
The conversion cannot be performed.
Retrieves the name of the specified culture.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to get the name for.
The name of the specified culture.
Gets a collection of standard values for a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> is not an exhaustive list of possible values (that is, other values are possible).
This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
This method never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
